"This change would have driven many people away for fear of ... a negative impact to their status in this country and would have caused a misallocation of nearly $700 billion taxpayer dollars for critical programs like Medicaid, SNAP and infrastructure and education grants.‚Äù

"The Constitution declared that we must count all persons in this country. This discriminatory question had no place on the 2020 census and it is a step in the right direction for the Supreme Court to deny its inclusion ...

In Nevada, the expansion of the #EITC in the Economic Mobility Act would impact 91,000 childless, working adults. The #CTC expansion will affect 146,000 children-- whose families will see added relief!.
